channel.title: Compiling problem 562 Help please!
channel.description: This is my compiler code. When ever i compile it comes up with cannot find path specified. Help please. [code]@echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java pause[/code]

item.title: Compiling problem 562 Help please!
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

whats your jdk version? and what are you running?? windows 7? vista? xp? linux? mac?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling problem 562 Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Mattiaspope Mattiaspope
item.description:
@Mattiaspope wrote:

This is my compiler code. When ever i compile it comes up with cannot find path specified. Help please.

@echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java pause
